mapper.insert: insert into issue (issueId, projectId, userId, taskId, title, category, status, count, content, sendingEmail) values (#{issueId}, #{projectId}, #{userId}, #{taskId}, #{title}, #{category}, #{status}, #{count}, #{content}, #{sendingEmail});
mapper.select: SELECT i.title, i.status, i.date, i.issueId, u.name FROM issue i JOIN user u ON i.userId = u.id WHERE i.projectId = #{projectId};
SELECT i.*, u.name FROM issue i JOIN user u ON i.userId = u.id WHERE i.issueId = #{issueId};
